item.description: Public changelog On the documentation an Integrations section will be maintained with the respectives changelogs as can be seen here, all integrations will have his own changelog, integrations will be grouped by lines (hotel, flights, payment). item.title: Community: Integration changelog example
item.description: Integration changelog Each integration needs a changelog to inform about releases, roll backs and so. This changelog won’t be at the documentation page, and will be keep with the source codce repository on a single file called “Changelog.md”. This file will be copied on the documentation changelog by generating a folder per day with a single file called “index.md”. Thus on the public documentation site we’ll have: …\changelog\2000-01-31\index.md …\changelog\2000-02-01\index.
